#### Assignment 20/02/2020

#####  Create a directory with the name "nielit" and "Nielit".
```{bash}
mkdir nielit Nielit
```
##### Create a file in directory "nielit" with the permission of 777.
```{bash}
cd nielit
touch file.txt
ls -l file.txt
chmod 777 file.txt
ls -l file.txt
```
